example_sentence_italian: Ho un bagno nel mio appartamento.
example_sentence_english: I have a bathroom in my apartment.

example_sentence_italian: Il bagno è al secondo piano.
example_sentence_english: The bathroom is on the second floor.

example_sentence_italian: Bagni pubblici sono rari in centro.
La pulizia dei bagni è importante.
example_sentence_english: The cleanliness of the bathrooms is important.
The smell of the bathroom is unpleasant.
The children run to the bathrooms.
I come out of the bathroom.
The smell comes from the bathrooms.
There is a mirror in the bathroom.
There are mirrors in the bathrooms.

example_sentence_italian: Ho letto un avviso sul bagno.
example_sentence_english: I read a notice on the bathroom.

example_sentence_italian: Ci sono informazioni sui bagni pubblici.
example_sentence_english: There is information about public bathrooms.

example_sentence_italian: Mi sono rilassato col bagno caldo.
example_sentence_english: I relaxed with a hot bath.

example_sentence_italian: Gli operai hanno lavorato coi bagni chiusi.
